protective.translation[0].definitions[0]: Sunscreen provides a protective layer against the sun’s harmful rays.
protective.translation[0].definitions[1]: wanting to protect someone from harm or danger
I can’t help feeling protective towards my kids.
He’s very protective of his younger brother.
protective.translation[0].definitions[2]: intended to give an advantage to your own country’s industry
protective.translation[1].definitions[0]: protective actions, measures, laws etc are designed to keep someone or something safe from harm, damage, negative influences etc
The company has armed itself with protective barriers, making a hostile takeover virtually impossible.
protective.translation[1].definitions[1]: protective taxes and other measures are designed to protect an industry from foreign competition
Protective tariffs (=import taxes) are a means whereby nations attempt to protect their own industries.
